work.name: Before approaching the light
work.description: Participating performance for 10 blindfolded participants. It is an exploration of a human state before the birth. Performance is a specific meditation that creates a safe atmosphere for the flight of participant's imagination.
work.performers: Karolina Žernytė, Aistė Jančiūtė, Artūras Lepiochinas, Jaunius Pisaravičius, Vaidotas Bačianskas, Raminta Šniaukštaitė.

rider.language: The piece is in English without translation. There is no script of the piece.
rider.stage: Minimum size 12 meters per 12 meters. Black box. No dance floor.
rider.sound: 2 HF microphones hung on the performers’ T-shirts
